mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, CATEGORY, PRICE, DISCOUNT, STOCK) VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{category}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{stock})
